metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl Ingredients:

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
• 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced
• 2 cups broccoli florets
• 1 small onion, diced
• 2 cloves garlic, minced
• 1/4 cup soy sauce
• 1/4 cup beef broth
• 2 tablespoons oyster sauce
• 1 tablespoon cornstarch
• 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
• Cooked rice for serving
Instructions:
• In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, beef broth, oyster sauce, and cornstarch.

• Ingredients :

• Instructions :
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

• 1 whole wheat pita bread
• 1/2 cup hummus
• 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced
• 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced
• 1/4 cup shredded carrots
• 1/4 cup baby spinach
Instructions:
• Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets.

• 1 pound ground lamb or beef
• 1 small onion, diced
• 2 cloves garlic, minced
• 1 cup frozen peas and carrots
• 1 cup beef broth
• 2 tablespoons tomato paste
• 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
• 4 cups mashed potatoes
• 1/4 cup grated cheddar cheese
• Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
• Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).

• 1 large whole wheat tortilla
• 1/4 cup hummus
• 1/4 cup shredded carrots
• 1/4 cup sliced cucumber
• 1/4 cup baby spinach
• 1/4 cup sliced bell pepper
Instructions:
• Spread hummus on the tortilla.

• Ingredients :
o 1 package dumpling wrappers o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage o 1/4 cup chopped green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 teaspoon sesame oil o Oil for frying
• Instructions :
o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.

• Ingredients :
o 2 cups cassava flour o 1/4 cup butter o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions :
o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.

• Ingredients :
o 2 cups cooked pinto beans o 1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil o 1 small onion o 1 clove garlic o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions :
o Heat lard or oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until
translucent.

• 4 pork cutlets
• 1/2 cup flour
• 2 eggs, beaten
• 1 cup breadcrumbs
• 1/4 cup vegetable oil
• 1 lemon, sliced
• Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
• Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper.

• 2 slices whole grain bread
• 4 slices turkey breast
• 1/2 apple, thinly sliced
• 1/4 cup baby spinach
• 1 tablespoon mustard or mayo
Instructions:
• Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread.

• 1 pound pork tenderloin, cubed
• 1 bell pepper, diced
• 1 small onion, diced
• 1/2 cup pineapple chunks
• 1/4 cup ketchup
• 1/4 cup rice vinegar
• 1/4 cup soy sauce
• 1/4 cup brown sugar
• 2 tablespoons cornstarch
• 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
• Cooked rice for serving
Instructions:
• In a bowl, toss pork cubes with cornstarch.

Instructions:
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

• Ingredients :
o 2 cups flour o 1/4 cup sugar o 1 tablespoon baking powder o 1/2 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 1/4 cup water o Oil for frying
• Instructions :
o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.

• 1 cup cottage cheese
• 1/4 cup diced cucumber
• 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
• 1/4 cup diced bell pepper
• Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
• In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper.

• Ingredients :
o 1 package spring roll wrappers o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1/2 cup shrimp o 1/2 cup mushrooms o 1/4 cup carrots o 1/4 cup green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon sugar o Oil for frying
• Instructions :
o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl.

• Ingredients :
o 1 cup rice o 1 cup coconut milk o 1 cup water o 1/4 cup shredded coconut o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions :
o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned.

• Ingredients :
o 1 pound chicken breast o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons peanut butter o 1 tablespoon curry powder o 1 tablespoon brown sugar o Skewers
• Instructions :
o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers.
